description: Agnes aged 11 ran away from home
title: Female genital mutilation
content:
My name is Loyok Jane, I live in Mbale. Back in my village, female genital mutilation (FGM) is rampant. Last week, my cousin Agnes aged 11 years ran away from our village in Kapchorwa and is now living with me. She said she was being forced to undergo FGM so she ran away. I want to know how I can help her. 

Kno da Facts

Take Action!
